title: Bofors HPM Blackout
text: Bofors HPM Blackout is a high-powered <a href="Directed-energy%20weapon">microwave weapon</a> system, built by <a href="BAE%20Systems">BAE Systems</a>, which is stated to be able to destroy at distance a wide variety of <a href="commercial%20off-the-shelf">commercial off-the-shelf</a> (COTS) <a href="Electronics">electronic equipment</a>. It is stated to be <a href="Non-lethal%20weapon">non-lethal</a> to humans. The total weight of the <a href="weapon">weapon</a> system is less than 500 kg.
